response.original_title: Samsung Galaxy presents TGC in あいち・なごや 2026 by TOKYO GIRLS COLLECTION
response.overview: Celebrating its 20th anniversary, Samsung Galaxy presents TGC in Aichi-Nagoya 2026 returns to the region after 14 years. Held at the IG Arena on February 15, the theme "TSUMUGU" blends local textile craftsmanship with AI technology, featuring top models, idol groups, and live musical performances.
response.title: Samsung Galaxy presents TGC in あいち・なごや 2026 by TOKYO GIRLS COLLECTION

titles.title: Samsung Galaxy presents TGC in あいち・なごや 2026
